name: bananas
description: Bananas Screen Sharing is a simple and easy-to-use screen sharing tool for Mac, Windows, and Linux.

scripts.typecheck: bun run typecheck:node && bun run svelte-check
scripts.build:linux: bun run build && electron-builder --linux --publish never --x64 && electron-builder --linux --publish never --arm64
scripts.build:linux:deb:x64: bun run build && electron-builder --linux deb --publish never --x64
scripts.build:linux:deb:arm64: bun run build && electron-builder --linux deb --publish never --arm64
scripts.build:linux:appimage:x64: bun run build && electron-builder --linux appImage --publish never --x64
scripts.build:linux:appimage:arm64: bun run build && electron-builder --linux appImage --publish never --arm64
scripts.build:linux:snap:x64: bun run build && electron-builder --linux snap --publish never --x64
scripts.build:linux:snap:arm64: bun run build && electron-builder --linux snap --publish never --arm64
scripts.build:linux:flatpak:x64: bun run build && electron-builder --linux flatpak --publish never --x64
scripts.build:linux:flatpak:arm64: bun run build && electron-builder --linux flatpak --publish never --arm64
